text: niṅṅaḷe bhūmiyil pratinidhikaḷākkiyat avanāṇ. niṅṅaḷil cilare maṟṟu cilarekkāḷ unnata padavikaḷilēkk uyarttiyatuṁ avan tanne. niṅṅaḷkk avan nalkiya kaḻivil niṅṅaḷe parīkṣikkānāṇit. sanśayamilla; ninṟe nāthan vēgaṁ śikṣā naṭapaṭi svīkarikkunnavanāṇ. oppaṁ ēṟe peāṟukkunnavanuṁ dayāparanuṁ tanne
